title: You're eligible to participate in the certificate ceremony!

desc.eventDetails: By confirming your attendance, you agree to participate in the ceremony rehearsal on March 3, 2025. Failure to attend the rehearsal will disqualify you from the ceremony on March 11, 2025.
desc.ifIneligible: If you did not attend or declined to join the ceremony, you may still receive your certificates at the library later.

pending.text: Are you attending this certificate ceremony?

accept.text: You’ve confirmed to <0>attend</0> the ceremony, <1>change of plans?</1>

decline.text: You’ve confirmed to <0>not attend</0> the ceremony, <1>change of plans?</1>
